records.name: Adaaran Select Meedhupparu - Premium All Inclusive

descriptions.direction: Located in Meedhupparu, Adaaran Select Meedhupparu - 45 Minutes from Male by Seaplane is on a private beach. Meedhoo Harbor and Maduvvari Harbor are worth checking out if an activity is on the agenda, while those wishing to experience the area's natural beauty can explore Gemendhoo and Mendhoo. Take an opportunity to explore the area for water adventures such as windsurfing.
descriptions.general: General description: The hotel Adaaran Select Meedhupparu is especially popular with honeymooners and is located in the vicinity of a sandy beach. The nearest shopping facilities are located approx. 1 km from the hotel. It is 5 km from the hotel to the nearest bars and restaurants. The airport (IFU) is located in the immediate vicinity. Another airport (MLE) is located approx. 170 km away. Amenities: The one-storey resort has 231 rooms in total. It offers its guests a 24h reception (check-in from 14:00, check-out until 12:00), a lobby, air conditioning, a safe (for free), a shop and a money changing facility. For the meals, there are 4 restaurants and a snack bar. In a total 5 bars, you can relax in good company. WiFi is available for free. Room cleaning is free of charge. Laundry service and medical service are available for a fee. Pool: In the outdoor area of the hotel you will find 2 fresh water pools. Here, there are sun umbrellas and sun loungers for free available. Meals: Breakfast (from 07:30 - 09:30) from the buffet. Sport and Leisure: Sports and entertainment: Tennis (for free, approx. 2 km away), billiards (for free), badminton (for free), table tennis (for free), football, fitness, volleyball and beach volleyball. Approx. 1 km away from the hotel watersports activities such as jet skiing, water skiing and speedboat rides are on offer (partly from local providers). Sauna free of charge. Spa area and massages available for a fee. Entertainment for adults: evening shows and live music. Child supervision: mini club for children (from 4 - 12 years). Gaming Room. Additional information: Additional fees may apply for certain facilities, amenities or activities. Some services depend on the local climatic conditions and the season. No alcoholic beverages in this hotel. Languages spoken: English, German, French, Italian, Russian and Arabic. Accepted methods of payment: American Express, Visa and JCB. Bathroom with shower (room size: m²). Towels are changed daily. direction.text: Located in Meedhupparu, Adaaran Select Meedhupparu - 45 Minutes from Male by Seaplane is on a private beach. Meedhoo Harbor and Maduvvari Harbor are worth checking out if an activity is on the agenda, while those wishing to experience the area's natural beauty can explore Gemendhoo and Mendhoo. Take an opportunity to explore the area for water adventures such as windsurfing.
